attributes.additional_details:
Lives will be put at risk due to dangerous defects. Approx. 10% of 
 my customers do not service their vehicles and rely on the MOT every year to make sure their vehicle is safe. The MOT is a very basic check of vehicle roadworthiness and certainly no guarantee that a vehicle will be safe for 3 months let alone 2 years!

Jobs will be put at risk in the sector, garages that have recently invested (approx. 30k) to carry out MOTs will be put into a difficult financial position.
attributes.background:
Keep the tried and tested MOT system which is good value for money. Do not change the requirement to 2 years with the intention to save households money as it will not have the desired affect.

My background is main dealer/independent motor trade having carried out MOT tests for a number of years.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Keep MOT tests as a yearly requirement
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/615690
